price: Wibuke ubwo (abavandimwe ba Yusufu) bavugaga bati “Rwose Yusufu n’umuvandimwe we (Benjamini) ni bo batoni kuri data kuturusha, nyamara ari twe benshi (tunafite imbaraga). Mu by’ukuri Data ari mu buyobe bugaragara.”
arabic: إِذۡ قَالُواْ لَيُوسُفُ وَأَخُوهُ أَحَبُّ إِلَىٰٓ أَبِينَا مِنَّا وَنَحۡنُ عُصۡبَةٌ إِنَّ أَبَانَا لَفِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٍ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: idh qālū layūsufu wa-akhūhu aḥabbu ilā abīnā minnā wanaḥnu ʿuṣ'batun inna abānā lafī ḍalālin mubīnin
